entities.name: platform nine and three-quarters
entities.description: Platform 9 3/4 is a magical platform in the wizarding world where students from Hogwarts board their trains to school. It is described as being hidden behind a brick wall at King's Cross Station.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts and the cousin of Harry Potter. He is mentioned in the conversation with Harry about their families.

entities.name: mum (weasley)
entities.description: Mum is Ron's mother, who has a second cousin who is an accountant.

entities.name: bill weasley
entities.description: Bill Weasley was the Head Boy at Hogwarts and left school before Harry started attending.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie Weasley was the captain of Quidditch at Hogwarts and left school before Harry started attending.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is a Prefect at Hogwarts.

entities.name: fred and george weasley
entities.description: Fred and George Weasley are twins who attend Hogwarts and are known for being funny and getting good marks.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story and is mentioned as going to live with Muggles.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: Muggles are non-magical people who do not know about the wizarding world.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are friends, as they are both students at Hogwarts.
Bill is Ron's older brother and a former student at Hogwarts.
Charlie is Ron's older brother and a former student at Hogwarts.
Percy is Ron's older brother and a current student at Hogwarts.
Fred and George are friends with Harry, as they attend the same school.
